test-case.name: XML10-3ed-Mixed-content
test-case.description: CDATA sections, comments and PIs may occur in ANY content. in XML 1.0 3th edition and older
test-case.test: <foo> a <![CDATA[cdata section]]> in mixed content. a <!-- comment --> in mixed content. a <?processing instruction?> in mixed content. </foo>

result.assert-serialization: <foo> a cdata section in mixed content. a <!-- comment --> in mixed content. a <?processing instruction?> in mixed content. </foo>
